name: The Chinese Restaurant Online Trivia | 'Seinfeld' - Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What movie are George, Elaine, and Jerry planning to see in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Plan 9 From Outer Space.

	In "Plan 9 from Outer Space", aliens whose first eight plans for getting mankind's attention didn't work try re-animating corpses.  The movie is only screening once, so the three are eager to see the movie.

questions.text: What is the name of George's girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Tatiana.

	During the episode, George tries to call Tatiana, but he can never get a hold of the pay-phone.

questions.text: When Jerry realizes that someone in the restaurant looks familiar, what is that person wearing?
questions.explanation:
A striped shirt.

	Jerry asks George and Elaine if they know who she is, but he's the only one who thinks he knows her.

questions.text: How much money does Jerry offer Elaine if she eats food from someone else's table?
questions.explanation:
Fifty dollars.

	Elaine attempts the challenge, but she runs away and doesn't get the money.  She also tries to give the patrons twenty-five dollars for participating.

questions.text: What is the last name of the man who enters the restaurant and immediately gets a table?
questions.explanation:
Cohen.

	The maitre d' states that Mr. Cohen is always in the restaurant, so he gets a table ahead of everyone.  The group continues to wait for their table.

questions.text: What is the name of the woman who Jerry thinks looks familiar?
questions.explanation:
Lorraine.

	He realizes that talking to her was a big mistake because she works at his uncle's office, and he originally had plans to see his uncle, but he canceled them to see the movie.

questions.text: How much money did the group try to bribe the maitre d' with?
questions.explanation:
Twenty dollars.

	The maitre d' doesn't realize that Elaine is trying to bribe him, so he gives the table to a different group of people.  Jerry tries to get the money back.

questions.text: Where does Elaine say she's going for dinner when the group leaves the restaurant?
questions.explanation:
Sky Burger.

	The group leaves the restaurant after they decide that their evening is ruined, and upon leaving, the maitre d' calls their name.

questions.text: Does George ever get to call his girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Surprisingly, over the long time that they spend at the restaurant, George does get to use the phone, but he catches the answering machine.

questions.text: Does Kramer appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	This whole episode is set in the Chinese restaurant, and he is not having dinner with the rest of them.
